header.title: Work Experience
header.subtitle: My journey from full-stack web development to specialized React Native development, building high-performance mobile applications serving thousands of users.

experiences.description: Leading development of cross-platform mobile applications serving 20,000+ active users. Mentoring junior developers and establishing best practices for React Native development.
achievements: Developed 10+ cross-platform mobile applications with consistent 4.5+ star ratings on App Store and Play Store
Implemented Redux Toolkit for state management, reducing component re-renders and improving load time by 1.5 seconds
Established CI/CD pipelines using GitHub Actions, reducing manual deployment time by 60%
Optimized application bundle size through code splitting and lazy loading techniques
Mentored 5+ junior developers on React Native best practices, improving team productivity
Integrated RESTful APIs and WebSocket connections with 99.8% uptime

experiences.description: Developed responsive web applications using React.js and Next.js. Built digital card business platform with focus on performance optimization and user experience.
achievements: Developed responsive web applications achieving 95+ Google PageSpeed scores supporting 10,000+ concurrent users
Built digital card business platform with Tailwind CSS, reducing CSS bundle size by 500KB
Implemented JWT authentication system handling thousands of daily user sessions
Integrated payment gateways processing $10,000+ in monthly transactions with 99.7% success rate
Optimized database queries reducing response time from 800ms to 400ms
Developed automated testing suites, significantly reducing production bugs
